website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you don't need fins. The mask, snorkel, and bag offer acceptable quality and an attractive price.
pros: Mask has a comfortable face skirt and versatile fit, and lenses are less likely to fog up compared to similar models
Gear bag is functional yet compact, and very portable
cons: Mask strap is a bit difficult to adjust
Water occasionally backs up in the snorkel tube, thus reducing air flow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, stop worrying if the resort has clean ones, bring your own!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were very happy with the snorkel sets. The seal on your face is tight, no water leaks. For $30 it's so worth bringing your own for vacation. As others have said, the case is convenient and great for storage but don't put your gear back in until it's completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: MGeis

customer_reviews.title: No Fog
customer_reviews.text: We used these new masks on our last cruise. This is our 52nd year diving and snorkeling around the world. The masks did not fog up which saved a lot of spit and grief. Snorkels have a new type of clip for attaching the snorkel to the face mask strap that worked much better than the older designs.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 9 YO and 5 YO - Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these (9 YO and 5 YO), fit was perfect on the 9 YO; however for the 5 YO the mask was slightly big and will probably fit better by summer. Both grandchildren are built slim. The masks are extremely comfortable and flexible. One thing, wish the storage bag was vented at the bottom to allow the water to easily drain.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for our cruise and they were amazing. No issues with fogging or leaking and loved the quality, Will definitely be using more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to take to Belize. I had never snorkeled before so I don't have much of a reference, but these worked great. No fogging and the shut off valve in the snorkel came in really handy. The last thing you want to do is rent some snorkel that has been used by a thousand people and this set was affordable enough I didn't worry if I lost it.
customer_reviews.author: RS in TX

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, great snorkel, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two kids (12 and 15) for a recent snorkel excursion and they both LOVED this set. The mask is super clear and comfortable, and did not fog at all. It fit my 15 year old daughter's small adult-sized face, as well as my 12 year-old son whose head is full adult size. I did not use it but did try it on and it fit me too. The snorkel did its job and kept water out. I would absolutely buy this again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maia T.

customer_reviews.title: We had to futz with the mask a bit to get a good fit but once we got the strap tightened correctly
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for long periods of time underwater and they worked amazingly well. Absolutely no water gets in when you dive underneath which was very impressive. We had to futz with the mask a bit to get a good fit but once we got the strap tightened correctly, it was waterproof and very comfortable. The mouthpiece is also really comfortable for long periods of time and the quick release valve works great. All in all very impressed for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: ... sets for our caribbean vacation and they worked so nicely! It was great not having to wear the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these sets for our caribbean vacation and they worked so nicely! It was great not having to wear the used equipment when we went snorkeling with our group and no fog on the glasses! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SLeonard

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to use for ages 10+!
customer_reviews.text: This was PERFECT for our cruise! I couldn't believe how well the mask fit everyone in our family (from 10 yo girl up to 40-something parents plus 3 other teenagers) with virtually no need to adjust the straps between users. The closed snorkel with the valve was amazing - I'd never used anything like that, and wow, what a difference! I've never used a snorkel/mask set as easily as this one, and the mask stayed crystal clear. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: These work just as well as the $80 mask and snorkel duo I had before this one! I've only used them twice so far, and the anti-fog coating is still holding up. They have a good seal, too, just make sure you get them tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha N. Alvis

customer_reviews.title: Great combo!
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I took a trip to Hawaii and thought this snorkel and scuba mask would make a great companion. The mask is great, fits very well to the face but the snorkel can be hard to breathe out of. However the snorkel does not allow a lot of water to seep in the breathing hole, which helps a lot when diving under the water to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Christie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for Maui and we used them and they were awesome! Nice suction and worked perfectly. Never had any leaks or fogging. Great price for what I got. My 6'2" son, teenage daughter and myself never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashnicbob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome. Bought for my son & I and recommended to 2 of his friends that joined us in Cabo San Lucas. Fantastic while snorkeling. They did fog a little but we used some spit & rinsed in the ocean & they worked just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Fields

customer_reviews.title: ... myself to 'breath" underwater but one of the grandsons liked it so I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to teach myself to 'breath" underwater but one of the grandsons liked it so I bought another. The second grandson liked it to I bought the second. Obviously they have been great hits. I did teach myself to 'breath' underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Diana K.

customer_reviews.title: ProDive Dry Top Snorkel Set
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very comfortable and good fit. Best mask and snorkel set I've ever bought. Going to buy a 2nd one for the wife for our Caribbean cruise.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel set
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 sets for my young kids for a Caribbean island trip. Worked easily and perfectly, with no water leaking. I used one of the sets, and it worked great for me too. My minor complaint is that I wished the storage bag was mesh so the gear could dry out in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J

customer_reviews.title: ... exceeds what I expected -- the storage bag is fantastic and sends a statement of the quality product you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my earlier review. THIS COMPANY IS AMAZING. I went snorkeling in some choppy waters in Key West and wound up loosing my snorkel. I wanted to order a new one because I was very satisfied with the product, but they replaced it free of charge. The equipment is the best and the company even better. I won't purchase from anyone else and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: We had been snorkeling on other vacations and have been disappointed by the cheap and faulty snorkeling gear that was ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these snorkel sets for our Caribbean Cruise. We had been snorkeling on other vacations and have been disappointed by the cheap and faulty snorkeling gear that was provided, therefore we chose to buy our own. These snorkel sets were inexpensive and they worked well for us on the two snorkeling excursions we did in the Caribbean. I recommend this product and also highly recommend having your own mask and snorkel if you enjoy snorkeling while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Geri L. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two snorkel sets to take on vacation in Belize. They arrived promptly but we didn’t have time to try them before taking them with us. Once we got there we discovered one of the snorkels did not work. I contacted ProDive and they promptly indicated they would give me a refund. I was very relieved they did not require me to send it back as then I would have had to carry the malfunctioning snorkel all the way back to the states to return it. I would definitely recommend ProDive, though next time I would test it out before travel.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel Set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for my grandchildren on their way on vacation. Pictures show kids are using the snorkel sets and having fun! Using them in the bay and pool. Was very happy that the fins weren't included as the kids do not use them. My 43 yr old daughter also was able to use the snorkel set.
customer_reviews.author: stathom

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling is Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this snorkel to use on my Disney Cruise in Cozumel, Cayman Islands and Castaway. The thought of using a snorkel that millions of people already used makes me sick to my stomach. Definitely worth the buy since renting at Castaway is $32 which is the cost of this snorkel gear. The snorkel has a water stop on it so when you dive down to the bottom, no water gets in the snorkel, which is pretty neat. It also comes with a carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: eight1178

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, would purchase again from those folks. Have used this once so far, and it seems to be a typical mask and snorkel. I'll use them once to twice a year so price was important with quality second. But it seems to be decent quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to use on my trip to Barbados. The mask fit snugly and did not fog up at all. The only issue I had was every time I lifted my head out of the water the nosepiece section tended to fill up with water. This was my first time using a snorkeling mask so I wasn't used to having my air restricted and so kept trying to breath through my nose perhaps causing the nosepiece section to fill. Overall great quality mask for the money especially compared to the ones in stores for around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: AO19

customer_reviews.title: Improved lap swims
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and my husband could not wait to get to the pool he wanted to use this to improve his lap swims and it worked. He was very happy with the snorkel and mask on the first outing. We would recommend this to anyone wanting to purchase a snorkel set. Great in the pool sure we will take on vacations for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: ritaskindle

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel adventures
customer_reviews.text: It grosses me out to rent used snorkel gear. This snorkel set fits easily in your carry on. I love that it came with a bag to carry the mask and snorkel, which is an added convenience for a trip to the beach. I used the set for the first time in November on my own beach excursion in Cancun. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: trisarahchops

customer_reviews.title: The snorkel was great too. I'd took others recommendations & im glad ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace 1 I had. The mask didn't fog up at all. My friend had antifog stuff to put her mask. Told her I didn't need it. The mask didn't leak & performed perfectly. The snorkel was great too. I'd took others recommendations & im glad I did. You'll be please if you buy this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel Set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old and it works great! She has been using in the tub to practice. I love how water does not get in the snorkel! :)
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Mostly works
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my partner for our Caribbean trip, and the mask mostly stayed on but slightly leaked due to his facial hair (mustache). Otherwise if you are clean shaved I'm sure it would be perfect. The blue was a little hard to see underwater because it blended in so easily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Always have your own
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them out yet but they look and feel great. I love the carrying bag. No more using the snorkel set that someone slobber all over.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our whole family
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these for each member of our family for a snorkeling trip. They worked like a charm for everyone (9yrs-46yrs). I have tried several other masks that you have to tighten so much they feel like they will crack your skull just to get a good enough seal to go underwater and not fill up. I did not have a problem with these at all. HOWEVER...the fog-free claim was great on the first day of use. The second day, though, they were hazy and constantly fogging up. I think we should have cleaned them really well with glass cleaner before using them again? Maybe that would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits comfortably. I love how the snorkel clips on to the glasses so it's easy to take on and off and the stopper for going under water is great!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and love the pink!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for snorkeling in Antigua and worked perfect! The storage bag was great for traveling and packing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Product was faulty/broken when it came to me
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the product comes with a slip of paper that says lifetime waranty by the manufacturer but the website it directs you to to make your claim doesn't exist. This is the cheapest piece of garbage. I bought it back in June and finally used it for the first time last week and it came broken. As soon as I tried inhaling through the mouth piece my mouth filled up with water. I tried a couple more times hoping it wasn't the actual product and every time, same thing. I was hoping I could return it but the thirty day window on it closed. I wish I had known sooner so I could return this junk.
customer_reviews.author: zita

customer_reviews.title: Mask easily scratches
customer_reviews.text: The snorkel worked great, but the "glass" on the mask easily scratched! Is it glass? Is it glass covered in plastic? We don't know... but we cleaned this mask like our other three masks (other brands) and it resulted in this mask having large swirl scratches on it. Now unusable. We can't return it as the window closed while we were out using it on a family vacation. :( It appears that it is not just glass, but likely has a soft coating on it that easily scratches. There are lots of good glass masks out there, recommend shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkeling Set!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these in blue and black for our snorkeling trip in Mexico. They worked amazing! They did not fog up at all, stayed in place and we both were very pleased. Also I might add that I have a very small head and his is very large and these adjusted to fit us both perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shalene Breci

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: The "anti-fog" lenses immediately fogged up and I had to take them off and spit in them like any other old mask. But, the biggest issues was the snorkel itself. Inhaling took way too much effort. Nothing in the description mentioned this. In fact, the snorkel is described as "Breathe-Easy". Far from it. I had looked at full face mask snorkels and opted for this one instead because the descriptions of those were, at least, up front that it took more effort to inhale. This may be common with dry-top snorkel's, but still should be stated up front before someone buys it. I think I will now just get an old-school snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: JUNK. You can get a much better silicone mask and snorkel at a similar price or paying just $10 more...
customer_reviews.text: Overall impression: JUNK. You can get a much better silicone mask and snorkel at a similar price or paying just $10 more... The mask proved to be too wide for my medium-narrow face, and leaked like hell despite all my adjustment efforts. A generic, one-size-fits-all silicone mask I've rented from a local dive shop fitted me much better and did not leak! The snorkel has a ridiculously loose latch that unlatches by itself under any pressure or after any abrupt movement. For instance, when you dive (from the surface, no jumping). Reattaching it in the water is also very inconvenient and requires too much effort/time.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a quality product: the materials are flexible and solid and the bag is sturdy. The mask adjusts nicely to the face. Will try it in the water in our vacation, in a few months. I love that even when I chose the latest date available to get the $5 for the Amazon pantry, they sent it earlier with another two-day order I had made with our Prime account.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglewings

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic clip breaks easily. Has lifetime warranty, but the website listed doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is sold under the "ProDive" brand name. But that brand doesn't actually seem to exist. It supposedly comes with a lifetime replacement guarantee; see attached photo of the packaging that explains the warranty. However, the ProDive.us website doesn't exist. We bought this kit for my son's birthday. The plastic kit that holds the snorkel tube to the mask broke the first time he used it. Besides the weak plastic clip that breaks easily, this seems to be a decent snorkel kit. Would like to be able to get a replacement clip for it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Port

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MASK NOt big  size way to small for adult male face,
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT suitable mask for any regular size adult. It fits my kid face however the silicone is such cheap quality and very ""DRY" feel it not not seal to face when you hold it up and breath in from your nose to see if air tight. This is the type of mask you would find in the dollar stoer/5 below. it has a very cheap feel and the tiltle is MIsleading calling it PRODIVE , no professional or occasional dier would use such a product. the silicone seem old and dry .
customer_reviews.author: robert duggan

customer_reviews.title: No Fogging!
customer_reviews.text: We've only tested this out in the pool and haven't taken it in our beach vacation yet. It worked great in the pool! I have a really small face and a hard time getting goggles not to fog up so I was sceptical of these. We had no fogging issues and the snorkel worked perfectly. The piece to attach the snorkel to the goggles is a little flimsy but the packaging says the company has a lifetime replacement guarantee and will expediate the new part to where you're located. Hopefully we won't have an issue while in the Bahamas but if we do they're claiming they'll expediate us a replacement while we're there.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel set I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have many snorkel sets and didn’t think I needed another, but I was wrong. This set has now replaced even my most expensive one. We decided on a last minute trip last month, and I forgot my snorkel at home. I quickly ordered this one and was very skeptical. The mask didn’t leak, or fog and was very comfortable on my face. The snorkel has a comfortable mouth fit and doesn’t allow water in the snorkel when diving underwater. After snorkeling several hours my face is usually sore from the mask, not the case with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Better than we expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for our first trip to the caribbean. She was hesitant about going on the snorkeling tours, but used this gear and loved it. The snorkeling tour guide, who does two trips a day every other day, told her (without being asked) after she'd been snorkeling a while that it looked like an excellent mask. Fit was acceptable. Snorkel guide said that if you wear the masks over time, they will shape/conform to your individual face contours. Over time fit will improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida. So snorkeling is a second nature to us. I am getting my two girls trained to eventually scuba dive. One is 8 yo and the other 6 yo. My 8 yo wears this mask and does great. Snorkle all day without a problem. Has a very soft silicone skirt. And a soft silicone strap. Put a strap cover on it for her hair not to get tangled it in and its a great starter mask. I wouldnt trust it with pressure diving. But great for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkeling gear!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set of snorkeling gear for my last minute snorkeling. I bought this pair because it had the best reviews. I was very happy with this purchase. The product came with a bag, which was awesome, it was easy to take the gear in and out of the bag. The bag can fit in a normal backpack as well. The gear functioned great, I can’t wait to use them again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mao

customer_reviews.title: Mask leaks constantly
customer_reviews.text: Just tried out my new ProDive Dry top snorkel while in the Cayman islands. The snorkel kept the water out pretty well but the mask did not! No matter how many ways I tried to adjust the mask tighter or looser I ended up having to hold the top of the mask against my forehead to keep the water out. Pretty much ruined my week of snorkeling since I had to constantly take the mask off to empty the salt water out and the salt water got into my eyes several times causing my eyes to burn and my vision to get blurry. Not my idea of relaxing snorkeling by any means.
customer_reviews.author: ewres

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a bad review, but if you need quality snorkel gear DON’T purchase this one! I purchased 3 sets in preparation for a snorkeling trip to Roatan. On the first use 2 of 3 snorkels broke while in the water! The clear tubing from the mouth piece to the hard blue piece that extends above the water became separated. The clear tubing is just slide into place not reinforced in any way so it could be slid back together but water was constantly seeping into the mouthpiece. Of course the times were purchased in advance of the trip so the return time had expired. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chezley

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP JUNK! Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mask for my wife on our honeymoon. Snorkel failed after 30 minutes, mask leaked, anti-fog was a total failure. Tried the toothpaste trick that I've used on many masks over the years, scratched the inside so bad its unusable... No way is this tempered glass. Can't return now because we're just now getting back from our trip. Wound up having to pay top dollar for another pair at a dive shop. Total waste of money and time. Spend the extra on something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Losure

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, but this is a beginner's kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit came as described. Pleased with the quality of materials. The silicone tubing detaches from the hard plastic tubing a little too easily, so you must pay close attention. I used this set in St. Maartin on my cruise and was satisfied with it. I've never snorkeled before, so the sensation of mouth breathing underwater made me feel uncomfortable. If you have never snorkeled before, I recommend practicing before using it in open water. There are lots of videos on YouTube that can help you learn techniques.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my husband who swims laps
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my husband who swims laps! He loves the fins and said the snorkel will conform to his face which is normal so don't freak out if it isn't a perfect fit at first. I highly recommend that if you are buying this for vacation, try the facemask a few times to get it positioned to your face. Great set, higher quality than expected for the price!!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water got stuck in the breath tube. Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a trip to do snorkeling. Worked well on first day. By the third day. Water got stuck inside and I was not about to clear it out and I was in open water. That was so scary. Nvr using ur again. I dunno if this one is just defective or it’s only good for short period of use. I only used it for about an hour each day. And I did rinse it with clean water after each use. So it’s not from salt water/sand built up. I was hoping I can use it more than one trip.
customer_reviews.author: evhairmakeupie

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kit for infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these for basically a one-time use during our trip to the Florida Keys. The quality is pretty good and the anti-water fitting on the snorkel actually works. Real glass lens so the clarity is good. Size adjustment fits a wide range. We used on people from 10yrs of age to 45yr olds and the fit was good with no leaks. Don’t know about long term durability but they worked fine for our one week trip.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Price

customer_reviews.title: Good for first time snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiancé and I so we could snorkel offshore during our cruise. My fiance's fit him perfectly and was a perfect first time experience for someone who isn't keen on water activities. Mine however kept taking in water. When we got back from our trip I contacted the seller and returned mine. They promptly sent another out. I just had the opportunity to test it out and this one works perfectly with only taking in very minimum water once in a while. Would definitely recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised but prone to fogging
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact and comfortable snorkel that I've bought to use in Hawaii. The suction is great and I had no problem with water coming in, the tube also didn't leak water when I dove in at times. However whereas there was no fog when we used it for the first few times, on the third day of our trip both of our snorkels started fogging heavily. If you buy this you may want to get some anti-fogging liquid with it unless you want to do the saliva trick :)
customer_reviews.author: outlier

customer_reviews.title: Mask fogs up
customer_reviews.text: Mask seems to fit well and is comfortable. Purchased for a cruise and this set was easy to pack. Unfortunately the mask kept fogging up which made for a disappointing and frustrating 1st snorkel experience with this set. After asking our guide, she recommended the toothpaste hack (just Google it) Sadly this trick did not stop the mask from fogging up when I tried it in our pool. Love the snorkel but will have to try an anti fog spray or buy a new mask since I’m outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: I use a snorkel for swimming three to four times a week. This is the only snorkel I use. I have bought other snorkels but they are difficult to use. NOT this one. It really is the only snorkel I use. Over the last ten years I have bought four of these snorkels. I plan to buy another for my travel days. It's light and breathing is very easy. I use primarily for lap swimming and would not use anything else. Easy to breathe, the adjustment band easy to adjust and light to carry in my swim bag. Well designed and attractive style.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this snorkel set I was very excited, it worked and the snorkel was really great! Unfortunately, after a few uses the goggles have started to leak no matter how tight I put them on my face. This has resulted in me not being able to use them. I have read a few other reviews and have found the same outcome, so I suspect this is more of a trend than an exception.
customer_reviews.author: jryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Comfortsble Mask.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful case for travel & storing (make sure to fully dry). Very comfortable mask that easily fit men, women & a 15 year old boy. Lots of our guests are new to snorkeling so we needed some extra masks for visitors. I tested it out first and it was great. Good visibility, easy to use, perfect for beginners and very acceptable for experienced swimmers. VERY reasonably priced for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Brades

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart easily.....
customer_reviews.text: The snorkeling tube has multiple parts which I’m sure makes it easier to clean, however it come apart very easily. 5 minutes in the ocean and the first wave that his my 9 yr old son the thing came apart and was lost in the ocean. Vacation fun lost on day 1. I would recommend either gluing the pieces together or find a single piece tube set.
customer_reviews.author: John Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel fastener breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mask and snorkel. Unfortunately the small black fastening clip that holds the snorkel in place is very fragile and broke first use. I own two sets of these masks as I purchased another because my kids love it. Sadly since the small black snorkel clip broke during normal use the first time on my new set I am now down to one.
customer_reviews.author: shredboise

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were decent for the price. I had issues with water leaking into the nose and I also had issue with fog. I used this set for several days in Mexico over vacation. I will try them again the next time I go and hope that the issues were due to user error the first time around!
customer_reviews.author: Rastko

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it didn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over two weeks now and the first issue I had is that it leaks where my nostril is regardless of how tight I have it on. The snorkel is the best thing about it and I wold rate that alone as 5/5, the mask however would be 3/5. Comfort wise if it didn't leak I would rate it as 5/5 as I had to problem wearing it for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Yon

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel gear worked great. My wife and I went to Grand Cayman and used these daily. The mask would fog up slightly, but I use to scuba dive and had a $200 mask that would fog up, so it is normal. You can not beat the quality for the price. I love the case that the gear comes in. It makes it easy to travel with the equipment and to carry it to the beach. If needed in the future, I would purchase this equipment again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: We brought these to Jamaica and not only were they easy to pack but the stopper on the top was awesome compared to others we have used. One of the better purchases we made for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: detached and lost mouthpiece
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great set and it was enjoyed the few times we got to use it. Sadly, the other day, my son was swimming with it and the mouthpiece detached from the breathing tube and was lost in the water. Very disappointed that the pieces came apart and we are unable to use the snorkel any longer. We would hope a replacement would be sent as this was not a user error - simply swimming & letting the mouthpiece dangle by ones face as they swim to a new snorkeling spot should not cause the separation. Hoping for a reply from the company and a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: H. Staufenbeil

customer_reviews.title: Great mask and snorkel, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear vision under water. Really easy to breathe and absolutely no water gets in the snorkel or in your mouth. Great suction on the mask. I have a full beard with a thick mustache and no water gets in even when I smile and move my face and stuff. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkeling gear for the price! My husband and I bought these for our honeymoon to Maui and we loved them!!! Beats wearing a rental many people put in their mouths!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip and it worked out great. It saved us some money because we didn't have to rent equipment. I also liked it because it has a nice storage bag that you can store the set in when not in use. I have a narrow face and it is hard to find face masks that fit, but this one worked out for me. I would recommend purchasing this set.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good underwater views
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of snorkeling, I fear the unknown... but with this set it wasn’t so bad... I like that the rubber around the eyes is clear and lets light in. Makes you feel more comfortable than those googles that only allow tunnel vision. I had no problem keeping suction and swimming for a bit. Nice set for the $$
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well For Amateurs On Vacation
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for a trip to the USVI. The carrying bags made traveling convenient. They were also easy to transport to/from the beach. We are amateurs and not picky about the quality of our snorkeling gear. These sets were exactly what we needed for quick tours of the reefs, in between sunbathing. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations for this snorkel set because the price was low. I was pleasantly surprised. It works great. I love the snorkel (no water seeped in even when snorkeling in waves). The mask was clear with wide visibility and did not leak. The carrying case is nice for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kat N

customer_reviews.title: So far so good ... more to follow
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for a reasonable and good mask and snorkel and settled on this one. I even checked a local sporting goods store. I'm very glad that I did. I tested the mask and snorkel in the bath tub (with Hawaiian music playing in the background) to see if the mask fit well before taking it on a trip. Yes, that is totally goofy but it fit well, was adjustable, and did not leak so off to Hawaii it will go with me. I bought a second one for my sister too. I will come back and provide a final rating after I take it out into the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Sniggih

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. The snorkel set looks great and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The snorkel set looks great and looks like it is built to last. Also, received an email from seller reminding me of a lifetime guarantee on the snorkel set. I didn't even know that the lifetime guarantee. I also like how this set comes with a waterproof bag. This is the main reason I bought this set because I can put any valuables in the bag and keep everything important with me while in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed this snorkel set during our week-long cruise in Central ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this snorkel set during our week-long cruise in Central America. We snorkeled in every stop (4 stops) - we were able to get some discounts when going out on a private boat because we brought our own gear. Great for free diving, as the water does not come in, and can easily be breathed out. Did have some problems with fog during swimming that was easily fixed with adjustment. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Love this snorkel set!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag to store in. I have taken it in carry on for cruises and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: The mouthpiece leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I am not new to snorkeling and have owned snorkel gear for many years. I purchased this set based on reviews and my needs for a travel set for traveling. It looks great and was easy to adjust. The mask worked well but the mouthpiece kept taking on water after my first breath. I adjusted it several times with no luck and was therefore unable to snorkel. I’m returning the set.
customer_reviews.author: Arpine McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkeling masks.
customer_reviews.text: Fit both of my children 12 & 8 well. Also would fit myself and my husband. Both boys love them! Comfortable fit, no leaks, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T.Den

customer_reviews.title: As others have indicated, this is a decent quality ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have indicated, this is a decent quality mask and snorkel set for quite a competitive price. I'm slightly confused that the seller decided to ship this product with a water sealed carrying case, rather than a vented case that would allow the mask to dry. However, this is a minor complaint, and most other masks don't come with any case.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Cat

customer_reviews.title: Convenient carry case & worked great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used this snorkeling in calmer water and open ocean water and worked great. No water leakage into mask & snorkel stayed in place when on, best thing was the convenient carry pouch! and the price! Was used by adult women & men. After we were done, rinsed out the gear, dried the inside of the carry case with a paper towel and will be used next time we need it! Again, the carry case was great in that the snorkel care was protected from sand and snorkel gear also was protected (and didn't get other things wet) when being thrown into a large beach bag or carried by individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Dacey

customer_reviews.title: Clear vision underwater.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Universal fit. Low fog made learning to snorkle a breeze. I brought it with me to the all inclusive resort. I don't like the idea of sharing mouth items with strangers no mater what disinfectant you use to clean rental gear. The price is low enough and they don't take up that much luggage space.
customer_reviews.author: chris rauch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible seal. Kept fogging up every 2-3 mins under water
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and saw the issues with the suction seal around the nose area. I thought I'd give them a try anyways, fast forward to our family trip in Hawaii. We went snorkeling and these snorkeling goggles fogged up within the first 2-3 mins under water. It ruined some of the fun, mainly because I had to keep clearing our my goggles every 2-3 mins which was annoying and irritating. These were advertised as " anti-fog" which is definitely not the case. Unless you like clearing your goggles every 2-3 mins while underwater, I'd stay away from these.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaIS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Straw and Goggles
customer_reviews.text: The goggles work fine, but water seems to get through when using the snorkel. The lower section of the snorkel seems loose but I didn't see anyway of tightening or putting it in place. I probably got a defect so... that sucks. Goggles are good though, No water got through when I'm submerged. I probably should've gotten the full facemask ones.
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping the mask/snorkel market recently. This product was by far the easiest to prep for use. The anti-fogging mask worked perfectly. I'm not completely sold on the snorkel mouth piece yet, but I've only used it once. I've got an older version of the snorkel so I may switch the mouth pieces. Time will tell. I use my equipment to swim laps in our condo pool. Makes breathing easier than turning my head to the side on every breath.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Whewell

customer_reviews.title: mask is good, didn't leak (although I only wore it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job, mask is good, didn't leak (although I only wore it twice and briefly). The bit of plastic that connects the snorkel to the mask is uncomfortable as it presses into my head and catches my hair, but it works well (although it did separate and sink when I jumped from a boat into the water with it on - fortunately I was able to find the pieces and put them back together).
customer_reviews.author: Ssss

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with how well it all worked, I was just looking for something to get me by on vacation and ended up impressed. The mask fit great, (I'm 6'3" and have a slightly larger head) and never fogged as far as I could tell (through several hours of snorkeling in Grand Cayman and the Bahamas). Snorkel worked well, and was comfortable to use. Had a great experience with it and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these for myself and my girlfriend prior to going to Cozumel to enjoy some awesome snorkeling. When we got there we adjusted the masks and got in only to have our eyes sting with salt water. After adjustment 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6 we still could not get them to seal. I ended up snorkeling for 80 minutes with 2 fingers lodged between the Seal and plastic holding the mask tight to my face. Only 2 stars because of the return policy and the breathing tube working well to keep water out of the top. May not work for you if your head is really big (like me) or small (like my gf)
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Mogilevsky

customer_reviews.title: Leaking goggles
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give a great review after my first and second use cause it worked perfectly back then. However, both my boyfriend’s and mine started leaking after our third time use! This even ruined our snorkeling trip because we tried few times in the beach before going to the actual snorkeling and this didn’t work in the real trip! Don’t buy it unless you just want one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Wei-Yuan Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: I used these for a few days in Hawaii, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a few days in Hawaii, but they broke very quickly. The buckle on the strap broke, then the clamp holding the snorkle on broke. It was pushed up on my forhead as I walked out of the water and I didnt notice that the snorkle fell off and floated away :(
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: It was great until the clasp that holds the snorkel onto the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great until the clasp that holds the snorkel onto the mask kept coming loose... it resulted with the snorkel at the bottom of the ocean. I gave it to my boyfriend as a gift. I'm PADI certified and have had my mask & snorkel for years with no issues. The clasp on this set really was cheap and didn't stay closed unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: What a relief! I just got back from using this snorkel set for the first time and I was more than happy with it! Good seal- I put some anti fog in to start and then didn't have to adjust the goggles ONE time! We snorkeled well over an hour straight with no problems! Good quality. All previous sets we have rented in the past we're cheap and leaked but This was excellent - no water in the breather spout either and it even comes with a convenient bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: verdesage

customer_reviews.title: Good design, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The design and fit seem to be really good. The problem is the quality control, I bought 2 and both had problems. The first one had the anti-fog layer peeled at one corner and on the other had an issue with the snorkel silicon that seemed to be deformed and didn't fit correctly. Returned both and went for a full face one.
customer_reviews.author: Arikur

customer_reviews.title: Crappy goggles, really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The goggles were horrible in these sets. They fogged with our first outing and no matter what we tried they kept fogging the whole trip. We had to wipe them out about every 5 minutes during snorkeling. It got so bad that husband went and bought a new pair of goggles so he could enjoy the snorkeling and be able to see. The seal on the goggles wasn't tight either. My husband and I are experienced swimmers who have used many types of goggles and we could not get these to either not fog or not leak water into our eyes. The snorkle worked fine and the mouth piece was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zeno Pfau

customer_reviews.title: the mouth piece on this particular set is very comfortable, where as the other was not
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to use them yet, so I will be writing another review when we get back from our vacation. I did purchase two of these, and two of another brand for our family. The only thing at this point that I can say, is that if you have a teen with braces, the mouth piece on this particular set is very comfortable, where as the other was not.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Worked Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use for snorkeling in Hawaii. Worked well with no fogging of mask. I’m no expert but the quality looks and feels good, no complaints. We could have rented there but I’m glad we took our own and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cruise!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to go snorkeling for the first time in a while. These googles and breathing tube are excellent. I barely got any water into my mouth. It was a very comfortable fit. It's great to have a carrying bag included.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new snorkel and mask as his last one developed a leak. He tried a full-face mask but didn't like it as he said that it made things look smaller. He is happy with this one. The bag is nice and it folds well so that it doesn't take much room to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of them and 1 of them go a hole in the snorkel on the first use! My son was so upset. We were in Florida going snorkeling and he wasn’t able to use it!! Not durable. My daughter also kept getting salt water in her eyes. The only good thing is they actually are anti fog.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not recommanded.
customer_reviews.text: We had hard time using this set. On some faces the seal is not good between the cheek and the upper lip. The mouth piece is heavy and big making it hard to hold in the mouth for more then 10 minutes. After a while the whole face start to get pain so we stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: RGold

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: When you go underwater the top of the snorkel seals and it is very easy to blow out the water when you resurface. I bought two of these and both worked great and I hope the rubber will last at least a few years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snorkel set for an upcoming cruise. Now I am so happy to report they worked wonderfully. Fit like a glove, didn't have to cinch in down to seal. No problem with fogging and the one way action kept the ocean water out of the tube. So glad I bought this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jalan Murphy

product_meta.title: PRODIVE Premium Dry Top Snorkel Set - Impact Resistant Tempered Glass Diving Mask, Watertight and Anti-Fog Lens for Best Vision, Easy Adjustable Strap, Waterproof Gear Bag Included
feature_bullets: MAKES SWIMMING MORE FUN, SAFER, AND EASIER! Snorkeling can be dangerous - mostly because people CAN'T SEE underwater! But this mask lets you enjoy PERFECT VISION from the moment you put it on to the time you take it off!

TEMPERED GLASS LENS IS IMPACT-RESISTANT! Safety comes first! Not even the hardest knock from the sharpest or heaviest object can crack or break the lens in this mask. It's engineered to withstand DEEP WATER PRESSURE, too!

ANTI-FOG LENS GIVES CRYSTAL-CLEAR VISION ALL THE TIME! When you're underwater, your breath can fog up the lens of cheaper face masks. But this mask is specially designed to be FOG-FREE - giving you hours of enjoyable swimming, diving, or snorkeling.

BREATHE-EASY DRY SNORKEL LETS AIR IN, KEEPS WATER OUT! This high-tech, DRY snorkel keeps air out until you're READY to breathe in! No more surprise gulps of water in your mouth when you're trying to breathe!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
